name: Get Out of Control! (literally...)
description:
A game where you have to help a cute little monster to get out of control, literally...

Arrow Keys to Move

Z & X to Rotate Camera

Crtl To Push the Ctlr Key!

A game made for the GMTK JAM 2020 with the theme Out Of Control, by:

 Marcos Agudo (Programmer) - @mercadodev13

 Fernando Barroso (Designer, 3D Artist)  - @fbcimbora

Music by Zeuz Makes Music
